resources.string: Interested in having Xavier in your app? Email us at info@blacksharktech.com for pricing and license inquiries
Disclaimer: We do not send your data anywhere
Enjoying our app? Rate us on the Google Play store!
• Make sure the MRZ is within the frame. The MRZ is on the bottom of Passports and Visas, and on the back of cards such as the Enhanced Driver\'s License or a U.S Permanent Resident Card.
• Make sure the document is centered within the bounds of the box
• Reduce glare on your document by angling the document or blocking the offending light source
• In dim lighting, enable the flashlight using the icon in the top right of the scanner screen
• Move your document slowly in and out
• Make sure your hand doesn\'t cover text on the document
This license is not valid for this device.
Camera error: camera is disabled by device.
Camera error: camera is disconnected from device.
Camera error: camera is already in use.
Camera error: too many camera instances open.
